channel.title: Nulling a server
channel.description: hey, well someone tried crashing my server by nulling it up, and it got really annoying. I tried banning the ip, which I did, but it still didn't work. Does anyone have any advice on what to do? I tried turning the server off for 10 minutes but it came back.
